location.description: The location that can be found when creating credentials in Outplay

client_id.description: The Client Id that can be found when creating credentials in Outplay

client_secret.description: The Client Secret that can be found when creating credentials in Outplay

start_date.description: UTC date and time in the format 2017-01-25T00:00:00Z. Any data before this date will not be replicated. Leave blank to skip this filter

max_api_requests.description: The maximum number of api requests per airbyte run. Use in combination with frequency to make sure to not surpass daily limit (aprox. 100,000 requests per day).
